name: Hotel Murano

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose the Murano for a quick overnight in Tacoma. We didn't want to spend a lot but also don't like to stay anywhere dirty or where they obviously don't care. The lobby is beautifully designed as are the rooms - everything was unique about it and they included a lot of local art.
reviews.title: Great stay at Murano!

likes.liked: — Great design and lots of local artwork
likes.disliked: — Front desk person was a low-talker

reviews.text: We got a special rate on the hotel's website. We would definitely go back again.
reviews.title: Superb in every way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked this hotel based on recent review on this site. The lobby was gorgeous and inviting with a cozy raised bar, fireplace, and sitting area. The displays of glass art along the walls were fascinating. My room was a good size with modern decor and all ammenities. The bed was wonderfully comfy and robes were provided. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room service was very fast and the food was suprisingly good. A few extras...when I could not answer my wake-up call in time, someone was knocking at my door within ten minutes to make sure I would awaken...very special. When I called the front desk at 10 am to request that I stay beyond the 11am checkout there was absolutely no hesitation by the staff to permit me to stay until 1pm. In otherwords, I would not hesitate to stay here again, and highly recommend it to others.
reviews.title: Hotel Murano a step above the rest

reviews.text: The remodeled lobby and interior of the hotel is exceptionally done. The staff is very attentive and freindly. Everyone, from the morning coffee bar server off the lobby to the baggage attendents were asking if everything was OK with our stay. The room that we had was very nice. Not large but very comfortable. The window opens about 6 inches for fresh air which is a plus. The work out room is more then adequate & clean. The Bite is the on site food place and the food was very good. Room service is very fast. We had it several times. The eggs benedict in the morning is exceptional. The lobby bar is a very comfortable place to have a night cap and everyone is very freindly. All things considered the experience was above average and comparable to the attention that I've received at some of the finest hotels. I would definetely go back.
reviews.title: Excellent experience

reviews.text: Online booking at Hotel Website. It was a good website. Staff was very helpfuul, room was well appointed, amenities were appropriate and excellent.
reviews.title: Murano was spectacular

likes.liked: — Great staff, filled with artwork, and proximity to art.

reviews.text: I had stayed in this building when the hotel was under previous ownership. There was no comparison!
reviews.title: What a makeover!

reviews.text: The staff seemed particularly helpful. The staff serving the banquet was excellant. The food was wonderful.
reviews.title: Upscale Decor at a Fair Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Murano is a trendy boutique hotel located in the financial district of Tacoma, WA. The hotel is modern and filled with interesting artwork, much of which is glass. The rooms are clean and comfortable. You can even custom order a pillow (body, neck, firm, soft, etc) or iPod pre-filled with songs (jazz, blues, etc). Nice robes are provided, but no slippers or lotion. The only complaint I have is that the walls are thin and you can hear the elevators, ice machine, and people around you.
reviews.title: Very good service, great lobby decore and a friendly staff.

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay very much. The room was plain but adequate and we did hear quite a bit of street noise. What the room lacked in luxury and decore the staff and lobby decore made up for.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel, but missed on a few key points.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were a little leary to stay in Tacoma, but pleasantly suprised at this hotel. The lobby is fabulous and the decor is fun. Most of the staff were excellent, with the exception of the person who checked us in. He didn't crack a smile the entire time and was extremely short with us. We were excited to be arriving for the first night of Spring Break with our girls and he made me intimidated to ask a question. The rest of the staff was very friendly and helpful. The bell captain even gave our girls a flower on the way out which they thought was awesome. The rooms are a little small, and our room could have been cleaner. There were fingerprints on the glass tables and even a lipstick smear on one. I'm hoping it was just an off day. Normally, I would have switched rooms, but we arrived a little late. Also, the restaurant was delicious and fun, and I really loved the glass art theme throughout the hotel. All in all, we hope to stay here again.
reviews.title: Beautiful!!!!!

reviews.text: although my first experience at hotel murano was a case of "the service doesn't match the drapes", my friend kevin always said to try everything twice...so i returned to hotel murano.
reviews.title: my friend kevin always said to try everything twice

reviews.text: the check-in that was before ho-hum, was hot-hot-hot. the girls working the front desk at 11:30pm who greeted us had the art of personalizing service down. i instantly felt like the rockstar i wanted to be because of the way my arrival was handled. LOVE.
reviews.title: What a pleasant surprise!

reviews.text: after a quick costume change, we went downstairs to get a cab to the club...instead of a cab waiting (as we had asked for) we found a stretch limo. seriously? yes. seriously. thanks murano! LOVE.
reviews.title: very accomodating

reviews.text: got back from the club and needed foodage. the front desk couldn't find a pizza place that would deliver at 2am, but instead directed us to room service. after taking our order, we were told that they were a little busy and it could be about 30 minutes before our food arrived. and how long did we wait? 15 minutes. no joke. LOVE.
reviews.title: Friendly, Helpful Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: less than 10 hours from check-in to check-out. but every time i encountered a staff member at hotel murano, my expectations were exceeded.
reviews.title: Great remodel, great art, nice room, value missing in hotel meals.

reviews.text: We stay here each year to attend cheer competitions at the convention center, and it's just like coming home! It's a one-block walk to events at that facility from the hotel.
reviews.title: Lovely place, constantly improving services

reviews.text: Everything at the Murano is very luxurious, clean and comfortable. The prices are even lower than the nearby Marriott!
reviews.title: Wow!!!

reviews.text: The hotel is located, though, in a seedy part of the city with few restaurants nearby and walking is not advisable.
reviews.title: Cant wait to come back!

reviews.text: This is our second trip to Tacoma and our first stay in the Murano, the service was awesome, the room was great and the decor was incredible. My family loved going around and looking at all of the art work in the lobby as well as all of the floors. The only thing that was missing was a pool/sauna, but would we stay again? You bet we would. Thank you staff at the Murano!!!!
reviews.title: immaculate hotel with modern style

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely spectacular in every way. I have reservations for May, also. Cant wait to come back!
reviews.title: Our new favorite getaway!

description: Hotel Murano is a glass-filled downtown Tacoma hotel, centrally located amongst a number of restaurants, bars, museums and more. When you enter the Hotel Murano, a world-class art collection greets you at the lobby. You notice that same commitment to form extends into every feature of this Tacoma Hotel. Hotel Murano features 50 glass artists and their masterpieces from all over the world, including Greek artist Costas Varotsos and Murano artist Massimo Micheluzzi. In addition, the hotel specializes in personalized guest relationships, ensuring every business or leisure traveler feels at home and has everything one could possibly need or desire. We are also proud to be a pet friendly hotel. Located in downtown Tacoma, the hotel is perfectly situated as a home base while guests visit local businesses, restaurants, the Museum of Glass, the Tacoma Art Museum and the Washington State History Museum. A stay at this hotel may just ignite that artistic spirit within you.Hotel Murano is a creation by Provenance Hotels, a company that specializes in hotels with deeply integrated art themes, that opened in 2008. Since then, the hotel has been recognized locally, nationally and internationally by multiple publications, including Conde Nast Traveler United Kingdom, USA Today, Elle Greece and Travel + Leisure. In 2010, it made the Conde Nast Traveler's (United States) Gold list and ranked No. 6 in the Top 100 Hotels in the United States.
